verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When I think of all I've done newline Nothing compares to what you give newline And to drink of what you bring newline You quench the thirst for me to live newline I am satisfied by what newline Tenderness you've shown to me newline And I empty all that I am

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And you fill my life newline You're everything to me newline There's nothing else I need anymore newline And I know you're everything to me newline And there's nothing else I need anymore

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I have tasted and I know newline This fire birthed inside will only grow newline And I've sought all that this world newline Tried to offer me newline And it led me to your feet newline And I empty all that I am

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I will lay down all my needs newline And you will come and make them new newline To make you my only desire newline My desire
